entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow changing to rain this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
